home.title: Mario Verdú

home.description: Digital product development aligned with your business vision

about.title: About me
about.description: Digital product developer with experience in design and development.

userUnderstanding.title: I understand your user
userUnderstanding.description: I explore my client's needs, compile the available quantitative and qualitative documentation, document each phase of the process, and align user and client needs with the help of intellectual tools (competitive analysis, sketching, user flows, etc.)

solutionDesign.title: I define and design solutions
solutionDesign.description: Iterate in continuous communication and propose a componentized MVP in design or code. Sharing of the project's weaknesses and opportunities, as well as the strategic approach to be followed in terms of the scope of the deliverables.

testingLaunch.title: I test, optimize, and launch
testingLaunch.description: I review, componentize, and prototype. Feedback collection and refinement of solutions. Delivery of the project and technical documentation, updating of libraries with validated improvements.
